Description: Pottery ostracon with text containing the beginning of a letter from a nun to her brother.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.72, pl.53)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82706) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82706)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 53:6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
